survey_name: Local Grocery Store Shopping Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their shopping experience at local grocery stores to help improve service quality and product offerings.

questions.question_text: How often do you shop at this local grocery store?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Mobile-friendly layout recommended.
